page.title: 19LOCAL SERVICES
page.content: { EMERGENCY SERVICES The Police,Ambulance and the Fire brigade are called Emergency Services. Their phone number is 999. The nearest Police station is 4 miles from the school at Daviot. The fire station is 11 miles from the school in Inverness. The Ambulance station is 10 miles from the school at Raigmore Hospital. Dr Bennet is our doctor he lives in Foyers.It is 17 miles from us. { {SHOPS Inverarnie stores is a mile from the school.We can get milk,papers,petrol and other goods. {BUS A bus goes to Inverness at 8.30am and 2pm returning at 10.45am and 4.15 pm from Monday to Friday.Only the 2pm bus operates on a Saturday. The adult fare is Â£1.10.The taxi fare is Â£4.50.
